title: test user login functionality
description: Verify that the /api/v1/auth/login endpoint successfully authenticates users with valid credentials and returns a JWT token along with user details.

title: test partners listing with filters
description: Verify that the /api/v1/partners GET endpoint returns a paginated list of partners and correctly filters results based on the type query parameter.

title: test create new partner
description: Verify that the /api/v1/partners POST endpoint creates a new partner with valid input data and returns the appropriate success response.

title: test list cattle purchases
description: Verify that the /api/v1/cattle-purchases GET endpoint returns a list of cattle purchase records.

title: test register new cattle purchase
description: Verify that the /api/v1/cattle-purchases POST endpoint registers a new cattle purchase with valid data including vendorId, payerAccountId, totalAnimals, totalWeight, pricePerKg, and totalAmount.

title: test list expenses
description: Verify that the /api/v1/expenses GET endpoint returns a list of expenses.

title: test register new expense
description: Verify that the /api/v1/expenses POST endpoint registers a new expense with valid category, description, totalAmount, and dueDate.

title: test list revenues
description: Verify that the /api/v1/revenues GET endpoint returns a list of revenues.

title: test register new revenue
description: Verify that the /api/v1/revenues POST endpoint registers a new revenue record successfully.

title: test list pens
description: Verify that the /api/v1/pens GET endpoint returns a list of pens with correct details.
